body_html:
Great stuff, vrv. That was the issue.

So, following that matmul only works for matricies up to 3000x3000 size or so. I guess that's fine. However, it doesn't seem to work at all for Matrix Inverse. Is this just not supported yet? https://developer.nvidia.com/sites/default/files/akamai/cuda/files/Misc/mygpu.pdf

tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: Cannot assign a device to node 'MatrixInverse_9': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/gpu:0'

Great stuff, vrv.  That was the issue.  

So, following that matmul only works for matricies up to 3000x3000 size or so.  I guess that's fine.  However, it doesn't seem to work at all for Matrix Inverse.  Is this just not supported yet?  https://developer.nvidia.com/sites/default/files/akamai/cuda/files/Misc/mygpu.pdf
